template.name: package
template.content:
@echo off rem /** rem * Copyright (c) 2013-Now http://jeesite.com All rights reserved. rem * rem * Author: ThinkGem@163.com rem */ echo. echo [信息] 打包Web工程，生成war/jar包文件。 echo.
%~d0 cd %~dp0
cd .. call mvn clean package spring-boot:repackage -Dmaven.test.skip=true -U
cd bin cmd /c msg %username% /time:0 /w "打包完成..." pause
